CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: b The on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) were extracted from the linear - regime transfer characteristics.

Let's think step by step.

1. I on / I off: These are electrical current ratios. They are material properties, specifically related to semiconductor devices, and can be extracted from transfer characteristics in the linear regime. Therefore, "I on" and "I off" can be identified as "Material Property Name" entities.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Name.

Paragraph: The on / off current ratios (I off) were extracted from the linear-regime transfer characteristics.

Material Property Name: I off.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: b The on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) were extracted from the linear - regime transfer characteristics.

Let's think step by step.
1. on / off current ratio (I on / I off) - This is a compound property name consisting of two parts: "on current ratio" (I on) and "off current ratio" (I off).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Material Property.
1. on / off current ratio (I on / I off) - This is a compound material property, consisting of two parts: "on current ratio" (I on) and "off current ratio" (I off).

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| on / off current ratio (I on / I off) |
| on current ratio (I on) |
| off current ratio (I off) |

PV.content:
Please identify the "Property Value" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: b The on / off current ratio ( I on / I off ) were extracted from the linear - regime transfer characteristics.

Let's think step by step.

1. on / off current ratio (I on / I off) - This is a property value representing the ratio of the current flowing through a device when it is turned on (on current) to the current when it is turned off (off current).
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Value of Material Property.
1. I on / I off - This is a property value representing the ratio of the on current to the off current.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Value |
| --- |
| I on / I off |
